name: 4 Containers
description:
A game developed during a game jam in a retro style, but did not make it into the game jam competition in time.

Instructions Keyboard + MouseGamepadForward, Left, Back, RightW, A, S, DLeft StickRotationMouseRight StickJumpSpace 
CrouchCtrl Use or OpenE

History:

John was a hardworking man who worked as a security guard at the port. One day, his friends decided to play a prank on him and left him locked inside the gate, with no way to escape. They even took away the key to the gate and left it somewhere in the port area.

John was unaware of the prank and found himself stuck inside the port, with no means of contacting anyone for help. He realized that the only way to get out was to find the key to the gate.

Determined to escape, John began to search the port for the key...

I hope you will enjoy the game!
